name: Soul Survivor (Game-U)
description:
Soul Survivor is a roguelike procedurally-generated game inspired by Binding of Isaac. It's all about practice: you must restart the brutally difficult adventure over and over, the ship changing every time - and no configuration is the same. Can you defeat the alien robots taking your ship hostage -  or will you just die every time you try?

Game made by Ryan Mickey from Flemington, NJ. Worked on over the course of about 4 months.

 

Controls:

Move with WASD

Aim with Mouse, Swing with Left Click
